item.title: Welcome to MetaDevWorld
item.content:
On this blog I will post guides, tutorials, and some of my own learnings around software engineering. I mainly focus on JavaScript, Python, and Java.
As I build this blog, I am attempting to manage it via my first self-generated RSS feed. A special shoutout to fellow Twitch streamer whitep4nth3r for helping me with date formatting in their 2022 article. Apparently I'm not the only one that saw an RSS fee as a viable option.
I am currently live streaming my #100DaysOfCode journey on YouTube and Twitch where I am transitioning from Software Engineer to Machine Learning Engineer with #100DaysOfML. You can find my current and past livestreams as well as other tech advice and videos on YouTube!
Follow me to check in on my progress and stay tuned for more info!
